! cue eval ./struct.cue
cmp stderr expect-stderr
-- struct.cue --
type :: {
    x: 0
    y: 0

    if x == 0 {i: 0}
    if y == 0 {j: 0}
}

data: {
    a: type
    b: type

    b: x: a.x
    a: y: b.y
}
-- expect-stderr --
data.a: conflicting values 0 and a.x (mismatched types int and struct):
    ./struct.cue:2:8
    ./struct.cue:13:11
data.b: conflicting values 0 and a.x (mismatched types int and struct):
    ./struct.cue:2:8
    ./struct.cue:13:11
